# Government Tender Announcement

**Project Title**
K4A22-240038: Roof Replacement of the National Hydrology Research Centre (NHRC)

**Reference Number**
WS4036235779-Doc4036279761

**Amendment Number**
8

**Solicitation Number**
WS4036235779

**Publication Date**
2023-06-12

**Tender Closing Date and Time**
2023-08-15 at 14:00:00 EDT (States Time)

**Amendment Date**
2023-08-11

**Contract Details**
Expected contract start date: Not specified
Expected contract end date: 2024-06-01

**Tender Status**
Expired

**UNSPSC Code**
72152601 - Roofing services

**Procurement Category**
CNST - Construction and Trade Services

**Notice Type**
Request for Proposal (RFP)

**Procurement Method**
Competitive - Open Bidding (RB)

**Selection Criteria**
 Lowest Price

**Trade Agreements**
Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

**Region of Opportunity**
Saskatoon, Saskatchewan

**Region of Delivery**
Saskatoon, Saskatchewan

**Contracting Entity**
Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
- Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage
- City: Gatineau
- Province: Quebec
- Postal Code: K1A 0S5
- Country: Canada

**End User**
Department of the Environment (ECCC)
- Address: 200 Boulevard Sacré-Coeur
- City: Gatineau
- Province: Quebec
- Postal Code: J8X 4C6
- Country: Canada

**Contact Information**
Matthew Virakorn (SPAC/PSPC)
- Email: [matthew.virakorn@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:matthew.virakorn@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

**Tender Description**
Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC), on behalf of Environment and Climate Change Canada (ECCC), is seeking tenders for the Roof Replacement of the National Hydrology Research Centre (NHRC) located in Saskatoon, SK. An optional site visit will be held on July 19, 2023, at 11:00 AM CST. Interested bidders must meet at the National Hydrology Research Centre, 11 Innovation Blvd, Saskatchewan, SK S7N
